settings.editor: We care, we listen and we always want to be better!

At Oscar Wylee Canada, our aim is to serve and keep our customers for life, and we know that is achieved through valuing our people. We pride ourselves on providing our customers with exceptional service, excellent quality glasses, and delivering them at affordable prices.

Starting from our humble beginnings as an online store in 2012, Oscar Wylee has grown into a global team of almost 1,000 ambitious people around the world. With over 100 stores across Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, and Canada, we continue to grow.

"Change for better”
We are constantly improving ourselves. We are a family that cares, listens, and always wants to be better.
We are always open to new ideas. We remain humble and true to our core values of integrity, continued growth, and open-mindedness.
We are always open to new ideas. We remain humble and true to our core values of integrity, continued growth, and open-mindedness.
We are one big team and believe in shared success. We strive to put others’ best interests at heart because we are the Oscar Wylee Canada family and believe in shared success.

settings.title:
Ready to start your career with Oscar Wylee Canada?

Come and join the OW Family!

settings.editor:
• Be part of a supportive and inclusive team
  • Grow and evolve your customer service and optical skills
  • Receive top training and advance your optical and dispensing knowledge
  • Immerse yourself in a world of beautifully curated eyewear and endless styling
  • Feed your passion for helping others

    And much more!
